sprint_goal: Establish the foundational API Gateway infrastructure, configure local developer tooling, and implement a CI pipeline with automated testing and quality gates.
Secure the API Gateway with a custom JWT authorizer, integrate security scanning into the CI pipeline, and automate deployment to the staging environment.
Implement the core GraphQL resolvers for user authentication and profile data, enabling the first end-to-end user journeys, and protect the API with rate limiting.
Enable real-time communication with WebSockets, optimize API performance by implementing DataLoaders, and establish a comprehensive observability stack.
